caption: Calm (Mount Desert, Acadia, 2024)
description: The sky, the sea, the silence - nothing demands, nothing shouts. It simply exists, quietly.

caption: Reflection (Fresh Pond, Alewife, 2023)
description: Still water becomes a mirror — of the sky, of the sun and of self.

caption: Excitement (TD Garden, Boston, 2024)
description: The crowd breathes in rhythm, the court pulses with energy. It’s not just a game, it’s a collective heartbeat.

caption: Peace (Charles Esplanade, Boston, 2024)
description: Where time loosens its grip and every step feels like a quiet agreement with the world.

caption: Joy (Jordan Pond, Acadia, 2024)
description: That bright, fleeting kind of happiness that doesn’t need a reason.

caption: Revelation (Niagara Falls, Ontario, 2024)
description: The rainbow rises through mist, as if nature briefly unveils something sacred — a fleeting glimpse of the extraordinary in the ordinary.

caption: Awe (Niagara Falls, Ontario, 2023)
description: Where fear and wonder become the same thing.

caption: Longing (Patenga, Chittagong, 2020)
description: Distant ships, a vanishing sun, and something in your chest that pulls — not toward what is, but what could have been.

caption: Renewal (Bar Harbor, Acadia, 2024)
description: The first light doesn’t just touch the land — it reclaims it. A quiet declaration that every ending yields a beginning.

caption: Clarity (Pokhara, Nepal, 2017)
description: As the mist lifts from a quiet valley in Nepal, the outlines of the world return — steady, calm, and clear, like a mind finally at rest.

caption: Reverence (Taj Mahal, Agra, 2018)
description: Even under shadow, the monument commands stillness and quiet — a timeless weight that’s more emotional than visual.

caption: Contentment (Srinagar, Kashmir, 2018)
description: A quiet moment on the Dal lake, with distant mountains and gentle reflections — the kind of calm that asks for nothing more.

caption: Glint (Revere Beach, Massachusetts, 2023)
description: The cold splash, the salt in the air, and a grin you don’t even realize is there.

caption: Foreboding (Dhaka, 2023)
description: A brooding presence just before release. It feels like the breath the world holds before the storm breaks.

caption: Vitality (Vernal Falls, Yosemite, 2025)
description: A force that doesn’t ask permission, only reminds you that renewal is never gentle, but always necessary.

caption: Grandeur (Yosemite Valley, 2025)
description: The vastness swallows you, not in emptiness but in presence.

caption: Grace (Charles Esplanade, Boston, 2025)
description: The water catches the fading sun as light filters through the branches — a soft, unspoken farewell.

caption: Restless (Cox's Bazar, Chittagong, 2025)
description: Waves break their own calm, but the light endures - a reminder that calm and turbulence share the same moment.

caption: Withheld (Cox's Bazar, Chittagong, 2025)
description: The horizon keeps the secret; the day releases its grip.

caption: Arrival (Cox's Bazar, Chittagong, 2025)
description: Light spreads across the water as the shore receives the day in silence.
